review: Ok so I have Severe Facial cellulitis due to tooth (need root canal) Taking 875-125 for 14 days. It took 6 days for swelling to go away. Breast feeding a new born as well we both had diarrhea I’m trying wean my baby. I have foggy brain and it’s hard to concentrate at times it’s really bad. Severe mood change, crying, confusion. I’m 36 years old and found my self crying out for my mom. I had panic attacks thinking I was dying I never had panic attacks in my life. Extremely, tired. After 7 days I think my body is adjusting and I feel better but extremely tired going to doctors tomorrow to figure out what to do.

I have a huge swollen painful abscess on my bum, the hospital gave me these pills 875mg, 2 a day. To be honest this is the second pill I've taken ,1 with food and 1 without and it works so far but it doesn’t last. The first pill made the swelling go down but then it came back so we’ll see what happens later on. This abscess is huge and no sign of pus so it couldn’t be drained yet. No side effects from pills i just hope they work. I"m prone to boils not sure why but… yeah.

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):After taking Augmentin, the very next day, I had the worst migraine of my life. I don’t know how I powered through school but I did. The next day, the migraine was still very present. Woke up and vomited because my head was hurting so bad. I went back to the ER. They hospitalised me after that for four days. Had CT scans and everything. Worst experience ever on Augmentin, that is.

Day 1 woke up with a horrible toothache..got so bad by the 2nd night I couldn't sleep at all. The pain was so bad I was crying and losing my mind..the only thing that helped was keeping ice in my mouth at all times to numb it..I was eating ice for 24 straight hours! :( Day 2 I did an online appointment and was prescribed Amox-Clav 875..2 times a day for 10 days. The first 2 pills I did not notice a difference at all but the morning of Day 3 about an hour after I took my pill the pain was 100% gone! I am on day 4 of this ordeal now..feels great and as of now I have had no side effects at all. I was concerned about this after reading the reviews. I did take my pill after I ate breakfast , drank lots of water all day and also took a probiotic pill every morning as well.

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):Took Augment 10 days twice a day, 875mg. Great experience but did not fully get rid of my stubborn infection. It only made me a little gassy with no other side effects.

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):I took augmentin for a nasty stye that was getting increasingly worse.  I do not have a good track record with antibiotics as I have either broken out in hives or it has caused some intolerable mood swings. I was nervous about taking it, but the stye caused me so much pain that I gave in. Hours after the first dose, the stye came to a head and immediately started draining. It felt like so much of the pain had finally left my eye. By day 4, other than the scar/scab, my eye looks and feels like normal. My digestion is a bit out of whack, but I deal with other complicated gastro issues, so this was not a big deal for me. Probiotics and kefir to help!

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):I was prescribed Àugmentin (Amox-Clav) 125mg every twelve hours for 10 days. Starting having diarrhea the day I started and by day five I became so sick I thought I was going to have to go to the ER. Horrible stomach pain and cramps, fever, extreme weakness, painful muscles mainly in legs, nasty sweat, nightmares, and I lost my sense of smell...which may have been a good thing since I was pretty much stuck in the bathroom. The fever and pain lasted two days after I stopped taking the augmentin on day five. The diarrhea has continued (on day eight after discontinuing drug) and is pretty much spontaneous. I can’t go anywhere. I have never had stomach issues in my life (I’m 50). I fear my gut is damaged beyond repair. This is a nasty, nasty drug. Also has worsened my depression and mental state in general.

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):I had a stye that turned into cellulitis with extreme swelling, redness and pain. If you google the most extreme pics of periorbital cellulitis, I looked worse than those. My lower eyelid was so swollen that it was projected so far out that when I closed my eye, my inside tissue, the mucous membrane was completely exposed. It felt like my skin was ripping apart. I was prescribed 1000mg Augmentin and after the first tablet, I was about 25% better. After the second tablet, all pain was gone and it went down to looking like a normal stye again. This was in just 24 hours. By the end of day 3 you'd never know it happened. I've also been prescribed Augmentin for bronchitis and respiratory infections and it's quick and works great for those as well.
My son diagnosed with facial cellulitis 5 day treatment completely healed 100% effective Excellent medication No side effects 100% covered NYS Community Plan

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):I was prescribed Augmentin for what my doctor thought was a skin infection on my right leg. Well after taking my first dose within 2 hours my stomach became extremely upset... burning...nausea... diarrhea....bloating...and anxiety and panic has always been a issue for me but after Augmentin it was immediately 20 times worse. My Dr ended up telling me to stop taking it on day 5 cause it was getting worse and worse. My skin infection cleared up with some hydrocortisone cream and antibiotic ointment but its been over 3 months since stopping this med and I'm still having major stomach issues and mental isses, so please be careful people especially if you have anxiety or stomach issues before hand.

***Make Sure You Take amoxicillin and clavulanate With Food And A Lot Of Water***  Took this for a gum infection. Also had wheezing from previous pneumonia/bronchitis. Doctor gave me this 875mg, two times a day, for 14 days. Had problems all along with some acid reflux symptoms since starting the meds. I don't think I ate and drank enough with the medicine and it has caused acid reflux.  Day 8 and about seven hours had gone by since my last dose. I woke after being sleep about two hours with severe burning in throat.  Couldn't even sit down. Had to stand so it would calm down.  Took a probiotic and drank water. Not sure what I'm gonna do today since I need gum issue resolved.  One antibiotic I like is sulfamethoxazole.  Cleared my wheezing but treatment not long enough to completely clear it.

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):When I received a shot of Novacaine at the dentist for one of my front teeth, it seems he hit the nerve going from the gums into my nose. My left nostril swelled so that it look like a pig nose and was extremely sore to the touch. After three days on the Augmentin, all the pain is gone and the swelling has come down to about half its original size, so my nose looks normal. I was particularly worried because I had to perform in two concerts two days after my first dose. The infection formed scabbing on both the outside and inside of the nostril. A little cover-up applied to the outside got me through both concerts. Still have swelling inside but it’s doable. High marks for this antibiotic.
My butt feel as if it is on fire.

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):I started this 6 days ago for an infection for a knife cut on my thumb knuckle. It seemed to work and swelling is down however I was advised to stop using it due to the side effects. Severe nausea upon waking, chills, agitation, unable to keep still yet tired, lightheaded and fatigued. The panic attacks and constant catastrophic thinking really made me need to stop this med. I hope it killed the infection because I think I may need a medicated coma for my next round

Been suffering for years with what's said to be possibly either Crohn's disease or HS (Hidradenitis suppurativa ) on the vaginal, anal and butt crack. Always told this was folliculitis down there with bacterial staph and MRSA. No antibiotic has worked. I have lots of cuts deep holes pus swollen lymph nodes in pelvic with intense itching all day and night. I was prescribed this antibiotic for 10 days I am on day 5. Since day 1 first dose increased the itch and caused a heavy feeling in lower stomach and surrounding areas. Increased urination it has me feeling like I have now a UTI. I'm experiencing more itching swelling. Incomplete bowel movements and urination. Tired and now I'm noticing headaches. The thing is I had a bad cough for a very long time which is practically gone. And my ear that has always hurt has stopped. Wasn't prescribed for those things but it helped. Wish it helped with what it was initially given for this vaginal anal infection. Not working for me but I'm sure it may for others. Good luck

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):Had Augmenting  a year ago for severe sinus infection..Just had again this time for a dog bite. 2 boxes and both times bp went up and takes ages to go back to normal after finish.

During last  few years I have used this antibiotic amoxicillin with clavulanate and every time I used, it gave excellent results. if you feel diarrhea that should be managed separately, take probiotics etc, take it with food.

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):Bitten by a dog got prescribed this worst experience of my life. I cannot sleep and I feel like throwing up the entire time. I just close my eyes and wait till the sun rises. Lay in bed wake up eat take my course and repeat....hate this antibiotic...

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):Augmentin has been a saving grace for my acne. It works so great when NOTHING else works. Unfortunately over the years it has lost its effectiveness. 10 years ago I would take  a course and have clear skin for months. Now a full coarse of aug 875mg will only last a few weeks after taking it before the unbearable itch and painful acne appear. Not sure what step to take next...

I been taking amoxicillin/clavulanate for 10 days, today is my last. After the third day of taking this my legs were very sore, I couldn't walk right & spent 3 days limping. I started getting bumps that looked like a rash on both my lower legs. The doctor had me finish the pills and gave me cream for the rash. Anybody else have this problem? I'm really curious because the rash look more like bites and I'm very scared.

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):I feel like the people that come on here to read reviews are people like me who have anxieties about taking medications. I needed this medication for a skin infection after my c section. I was nervous about the symptoms after reading the comments on here but I had ZERO problems with this medication. I was prescribed 875mg 2x daily. I made sure I ate a pro-biotic yogurt before starting this med and had one every day for 7 days until I was finished. I had no upset stomach or diarrhea.

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):Throughout the whole course I had horrible nausea and diarrhoea :/2 weeks after finishing the course I'm still sick!So fatigued, flu like symptoms, chills and sweats, terrible cramps and always in the bathroom. I've now been diagnosed with colitis from augmentin.I'm more sick after the course than I was before I actually needed the antibiotics!!I've never had a reaction to any other antibiotic so would never ever take that again.

Took for gum infection. 3 days in to the prescription, I started have major anxiety attacks. Heart Palpitations, HBP,  dizzy, shaky, clammy. Sent me to the ER as I thought I was having a heart attack. It was awful. I will never take again. If you have to take it, please be aware of these side effects. No one tells us about the panic, but upon doing some research, it's pretty common.

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):Took this for 10 days after a cat bite got infected.  Noticed hyperactivity during the course, but it was two days after I finished the course that the real fun started - fatigue, head fog, inability to do anything, weight loss (three kg in four days!), really bad insomnia (unable to sleep until 5 am), unable to stomach anything except carbs.  After a week of this the nausea started, so that I couldn't eat anything without debilitating nausea.  Headaches too.  Am still in it after two weeks.  Treating myself with ginger tea for nausea, slippery elm, probiotics, dandelion leaf and root for liver, lemon water, vegetable juices.  I  will never take this again.

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):This med was given as a result of a deep gouge from a dog nail. Healing was not occurring after 4 weeks including a trip to a ambulatory care. My doc said they treated it incorrectly. He prescribed this. I have an appointment at the wound center Tues.  Dr also said it needed debriding. After 5 days I see no improvement. If anything the area is more red and sore.

Went in for an ear infection. It cleared it right up but on the seventh day got SEVERE cramps and was running to the bathroom every five minutes. Will NEVER be taking this again. So hard on the stomach. Had to leave work! So much pain ruined a couple days for me

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):I've been taking this for about two weeks to combat cellulitis and after first trying Keflex and Bactrim which did not work, the Augmentin is working quite well.I haven't had any stomach upset or GI discomfort. I haven't had any Diarrhea that couldn't be easily stopped with a normal dose of over-the-counter Loperamide. Had a slight bit but the Loperamide fixed that right up.
skin burns, stomach is upset feels like a need to vomit

I started taking amoxicillin/clavulanate yesterday afternoon for Infection from Cat Bite . I took my first pill around 6:00 pm with my dinner and didn't think anything of it. Around 10:00 pm I had an awful headache. I had to take ibuprofen and go lay down until it finally eased. I woke up this morning with stomach cramps and diarrhea. took my second dose this morning around 11:00 am with lunch and after eating I felt a little  nauseous, but nothing too extreme. It wasn't long after I took the pill that I got a headache and I've had it ever since. Overall I've felt a little icky altogether after starting the medicine, but it does seem to be helping my infection.

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):Don't know what's worse....the cellulitis infection or side effects of augmentin. Headache, gassiness, bloating, stomach upset from day one. Horrible vomiting on day 5. Thank goodness I only have 7 day Rx. Calling Dr tomorrow and will beg not to take last 2 days or switch to something else.

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):I had an external ear infection for almost 18 days, on my first check up the doctor prescribed Clindamycin, but that didn't work on me. About 2 weeks later i still have no signs off healing through Clindamycin, I decided to be checked-up again with different doctor (ENT) & I was diagnosed with Chondritis. He prescribed Augmentin 625mg, 3x a day, every 8hrs. and Inoflox, which is also an antibiotic for twice a day. I experienced side effects such as diarrhea that lasted only on 2nd day. I just realized  that this side effect are temporary. Now i am on my 4th day on these antibiotics, i can say that im healing and my ear forms back again to its normal size.

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):I was prescribed Augmentin 875(?) to be taken twice a day for 10 days to try and prevent infection from a bad cat bite. I did experience symptoms, but because I suffer from IBS it mostly seemed like an IBS flare to me. The looser stools started on day two, but they were not diarrhea. That was it until around day 8 when I bloated like you wouldn't believe. It was all up in my stomach and nothing gave me relief. However, I continued on taking my pills and my probiotics and finished a couple of days ago. The side effects were not pleasant, but they were much less unfortunate than I was expecting after reading reviews. I never got an infection from the cat bite, which normally leads to one in about 80% of people. So, the drug worked!

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):Very effective on infection but stomach severe pains in the upper stomach had to stop taken it severe dirahea non stop to the toliet may need to see dr now and i stopped taken it an stomach still hurts

This was for an animal bit that might cause infection. Its a horrible medicine, late period due to the medicine. Horrible diarrhea and vomited one morning. I have been very moody and tired. I will never take this again if I can help it! I quit taking it after 4 days I couldn't handle it any more. And for some reason I feel like I have something in my throat. Oh and my anxiety is out of control!!!

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):I was prescribed this twice a day for 7 days. I'm halfway through and I recently developed severe headaches, decreased appreciate, decreased urination, and shortness of breath. No diahrrea yet, but I did feel nauseous this morning. I hope not to get diahrrea because I'm trying to heal an anal fissure. I tested negative for some common STDs so I don't know what I have but my groin lymph nodes still seem to be swollen. :/

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):I took this medicine for a tooth abscess that couldn't be drained during root canal. Severe diarrhea, headaches, minor heartburn and I felt as though my throat were closing (doc said minor allergic reaction). I have been taking a probiotic and eating yogurt but it hasn't helped with the stomach upset at all.  It helped with the abscess but 8 days later it isn't completely cleared. I've been switched to Clindamycin due to the tightening in my throat. Scared to death and sick of antibiotics.

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):Was prescribed the 875 mg tabs every 12 hours for an infected cyst. Right from the 1st dose I experienced stomach upset, severe bloating, and Diarrhea that burned. Within several days I also developed a vaginal yeast infection and severe yeast rashes in both armpits.  I normally have a cast iron stomach and can take normally any medication without meals and have no problems.  The augmentin caused bad side effects even with meals.  Stay away from this drug it is well known to cause stomach problems.
Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):The pills are so big I had to split in half and the pills smell bad however the medication works for my skin infection
Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):Yes it is absolutely useful for infectious acne. It is one of the best and also less harmful.

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):I have adult acne and rosacea due to pcos. I have redness, welt type acne, rash type scne, black/white heads on my face. When taking Augmentin, all my skin problems dissappear within 2-5 days and my face stays clear while taking the prescription. Augmentin is a Godsend.

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):Overall, not too bad.  Had some mild nausea and diarrhea the first two or three days, but then drank Kefir which helped immensely.  Be sure to take as directed with some food (you don't need a whole meal) and eat yogurt etc.  I highly recommend Kefir during Augmentin therapy.  Began clearing the infection by the second day.  Remember, most people have little to no side effects with these medications, so what you tend to read on the Internet is negatively biased.

Recently, my ear drum ruptured during my sleep.  Actually, the pain awakened me first.  Although I am leaning towards my severe TMJ for causing the rupture, I am still uncertain as to exactly why.  I saw my physician the following morning and was prescribed Amoxicilln 875mg, twice per day.  I was also prescribed antibiotic and steroid ear drops. This was 3 days ago. I also have severe acne caused by folliculitis.  Embarrassingly, I also have scabs where I will scrape the hair with my nail.  I use Tazorac Cream for it, but this has always made it worse. Much to my surprise, I am overjoyed to see how much better my skin already looks. It's like night and day. Almost completely clear after years of dealing with this. Amazing.

I was proscribed Amox-Clav 875mg Tablets for a very bad skin infection on my legs (both). My skin was peeking off and under the skin it was red and tender to the touch.  Within a week, the spot grew from a dime size to about 7 inches wide by 5 inches tall.  After the first week, the infection moved to my right leg.  My Doctor proscribed me this medication and after taking for about 5 days, the sores started to scab over and the sore/tenderness was going away.  I highly recommend this medication for skin infections.

I scraped up my inner knee on a mossy log. By day 4, it was not improved, & had a clearly infected area around the small scrapes--swollen, red (and white when you push on it, quickly turning red again), about an inch to 1.5 inches all around the wound area--tender to touch.I went to the doctor and was prescribed this for 10 days. I am only through the 2nd dose. I have taken this medicine before for sinusitis, & did not have side effects. After only 15 hours since first dose, wound is healing beautifully.

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):I have used Augmentin several times mainly for skin infection (acne) and had found it effective although I took only half course of 7 tabs x 625mg on each occasion. So far I have experienced no sight effects. I also increased my probiotics intake while on this antibiotic. The probiotics should not be taken at same time but after a lapse of time, say four hours or longer after consuming the drug. I would recommend Augmentin as it is effective and to me there is no side effect.
Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):I'm beginning to feel the effect of the medication after days of taking it.PS Complete the course of the medication (Under doctor's advise)

Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):I suffered from Pseudofolliculitis behind my head for years and by chance I got Augmentin from Libya without any prescription. In Europe all the doctors that I consulted could not find solution for this problem so one day I just worked into a pharmacy in Libya and showed it to the Doctor in charge of the pharmacy who adviced me to take Augmentin. I was a bit hesitant but before my returning date (after 5 days) I noticed that all the bumps are drying.and now I'm very proud of my head.
